reference: Ethier, Wilfred J. (1982), Decreasing Costs in International Trade and Frank Grahams Argument for Protection, Econometrica 50, pp.1243-1268.
Feenstra, Robert C. (1990), Trade and Uneven Growth, National Bureau of Economic Research Working Paper No. 3276.
Graham, Frank (1923), Some Aspects of Protection Further Considered, Quarterly Journal of Economics 37, pp.199-227.
Grossman, Gene I. and Belpman, Elhanan (1989), Product Development and International Trade, Journal of Political Economy 97, pp.1261-1283.

Jones, Ronald W. (1970), The Role of Technology in the Theory of International Trade, in Raymond Vernon, ed., The Technology Factor in International Trade (New York, NY: Columbia University Press for the National Bureau of Economic Research).

Krugman, Paul R. (1987), The Narrow loving Band, The Dutch Disease, and the Competitive Consequences of Irs. Thatcher: Notes on Trade in the Presence of Dynamic Scale Economies, Journal of Development Economics 27, pp.41-55.
